name: REBIRTH (itch) (tumech games)
description:
overview      

in rebirth die, respawn and use your body as platforms to progress. this game was made for the third wowie game jam hosted by jonas tyroller with the theme of failure is progress. 

     controls     

arrow keys to run and jump

run towards a wall to slowly slide down it

jump during a wall slide the run to the opposite direction to wall jump
